title: Chicken and mushroom chowder
ingredients: ['750ml chicken stock', '125ml water', '450g cubed cooked chicken breast', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried oregano', '1/4 teaspoon pepper', '100g uncooked long grain rice', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 carrot, finely chopped', '350g mushrooms, sliced', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '250ml milk']
